languageKey.label: Fixed width of the Cycle container.
Fixed height of the Cycle container.
Navigation for the Cycle.
Set transitions for content slide. Multible selection allowed.
Set to true if in/out transitions should occur simultaneously.
Milliseconds between slide transitions (0 to disable auto advance).
Set true to start next transition immediately after current one completes.
Speed of the transition (any valid fx speed value).
Speed of the 'in' transition.
Speed of the 'out' transition.
User defined options in JavaScript style (see http://jquery.malsup.com/cycle/options.html).
Every single pagecontent records represents a slider content.
Feste Breite des Cycle-Containers.
Feste Höhe des Cycle-Containers.
Navigation des Cycle.
Setzt die Übergänge der Seiteninhalte. Mehrfachauswahl erlaubt.
Jeder einzelne Seiteninhalt repräsentiert einen Slider-Inhalt.
